awd_titl_txt: Measuring Metabolic Fluxes: Applications for Elucidating    Energetics and Regulations
awd_abstract_narration: This project plans to map the                                                   fluxes, enzyme activities, and                                                  metabolic levels for key reactions                                              in the glycolytic pathway and the                                               tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle for                                              two common bacteria, E. coli and B.                                             subtilis.  Both wild-type and                                                   metabolic mutants will be examined                                              in order to obtain regulatory                                                   insights and alternative yield                                                  scenarios.  Four areas are expected                                             to be impacted.  First, an improved                                             understanding of how the TCA cycle                                              and glycolysis are coordinated                                                  would be obtained.  Secondly, the                                               magnitude of the energy spilling                                                reactions would be determined.                                                  Thirdly, the results could prove                                                useful to developing cultivation                                                conditions that promote the maximal                                             conversion of carbon to cell mass.                                              Finally, metabolic engineering                                                  strategies could be identified that                                             would allow one to alter the                                                    regulation of the cell in an                                                    optimal manner.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
